core: Applied machine learning to accelerate root cause analysis and boost production yield of radiation-exposed optical fiber for navigation gyroscopes, spanning from first principles investigation to production optimization

ml_engineer.short: Built predictive ML models to optimize optical fiber production
ml_engineer.medium: Developed ML pipeline for analyzing high-dimensional manufacturing data
ml_engineer.detailed: Created end-to-end ML system for predicting optical fiber performance, incorporating multiple data sources and enabling weekly decision-making for production optimization

data_scientist.short: Led data-driven root cause investigation of optical components
data_scientist.medium: Built data pipeline analyzing complex radiation test results
data_scientist.detailed: Engineered comprehensive data pipeline integrating manufacturing data, test results, and physics-based simulations to identify root causes of unexpected radiation performance

research_lead.short: Led investigation into radiation effects on optical components
research_lead.medium: Directed multidisciplinary investigation of radiation-material interactions
research_lead.detailed: Spearheaded investigation combining physics principles, experimental data, and machine learning to optimize radiation performance of optical components

technical_lead.medium: Directed implementation of ML-based production improvements
technical_lead.detailed: Led end-to-end development of ML tools that transformed manufacturing data into actionable insights for production optimization

technical_ic.short: Built ML models to optimize production processes
technical_ic.medium: Developed ML pipeline from scratch to boost manufacturing yield
technical_ic.detailed: Architected end-to-end ML system for manufacturing optimization, implementing data pipeline for high-dimensional inputs and automated retraining capabilities

innovation_lead.medium: Led transition to ML-driven decision making in production
innovation_lead.detailed: Spearheaded adoption of ML methodologies in manufacturing, establishing new paradigm for process optimization

subject_matter_expert.medium: Guided implementation of ML systems across production
subject_matter_expert.detailed: Served as technical authority for ML integration in manufacturing, advising on algorithm selection and implementation strategies
